column1: jerry bunyun lord| jerry bunyun lord passed away on thursday
column3: 2015. a graveside service will be held on monday june 15
column4: 2015 at 2:00pm at macon memorial park. mr. lord was predeceased by his parents bunyun howard lord and joyce bush lord. he is survived by his sister peggy lawless of macon
column5: georgia; nephew shawn hairston (laura) of hawkinsville
column6: georgia; great niece aubrie hairston; aunt betty jo carnish (marvin) of milledgeville
column7: georgia; and several cousins. register online at www. hartsmort. com. harts mortuary and crematory
